EXSLTMathMin.summary: math:min() returns the minimum value of a node-set.

remarks.para: To compute the minimum value of the node-set, the node set is sorted into ascending order as it would be using xsl:sort() with a data type of number. The minimum value is then the first node in the sorted list, converted into a number.

EXSLTMathMin.returns: A result tree fragment representing the lowest valued node's numeric value as a string.
